TermDefinition.DefinitionText: An anticancer drug belonging to a family of drugs called radiopharmaceuticals.

Pronunciation of dictionary term "indio In 111 pentetreotida"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Medicamento contra el cáncer. Es un tipo de radiofármaco.
